inputPortDescriptors.description: The directory containing GeoTIFF images to be converted.
inputPortDescriptors.name: data

inputPortDescriptors.description: A comma-separated list of image files to be processed.
inputPortDescriptors.name: images

outputPortDescriptors.description: Output directory containing Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF image.
outputPortDescriptors.name: data

name: CloudOptimizedGeoTIFF
description: Generates a Cloud Optimized GeoTIFF from a standard GeoTIFF using GDAL v2.2.0 that is validated using the GDAL validation script at https://svn.osgeo.org/gdal/trunk/gdal/swig/python/samples/validate_cloud_optimized_geotiff.py. If the task fails to generate a valid Cloud Optimized Geotiff, it will create a log file named <image_id>.error.log in the output directory.
